javadoc: FunctionLocation provides information about the location in a program within a Function.

methods.javadoc:
Return the Function symbol address which may differ from the "location address" when
 a function is indirectly inferred via a reference.  WARNING: The {@link #getAddress()} should
 not be used to obtain the function address!
@return the function address corresponding to this program location
methods.name: getFunctionAddress
methods.comment:
Return the Function symbol address which may differ from the "location address" when
 a function is indirectly inferred via a reference.  WARNING: The #getAddress() should
 not be used to obtain the function address!

return.comment: the function address corresponding to this program location

methods.name: saveState
methods.comment: Save this function location to the given save state object.

params.name: obj
params.comment: the save state object for saving the location

methods.javadoc:
Restore this function location using the given program and save state object.
@param prefix prefix appended to the names of the save state items to make the entry unique
methods.name: restoreState
methods.comment: Restore this function location using the given program and save state object.

name: FunctionLocation
comment:
FunctionLocation provides information about the location
 in a program within a Function.
